data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Governments should make efforts to improve the living conditions of low-income families. They can provide free early childhood services for children from such families. Besides, providing free groceries such as milk and eggs will also be helpful.（37 字）
data.referenceText: What types of subsidies do you believe that government should provide and to whom?
data.referenceTranslate: 你认为政府应该提供什么类型的补贴，向谁提供?
